name: Small Dish with Blue Star
description:
This sweet little round ceramic dish is handmade from a free form piece of low-fire clay. I form each one in my hand so no 2 are alike. The star impression is colored with denim blue glaze and then a clear glaze is applied to the entire piece. It is food safe glaze, but this little dish is good for rings, soggy tea bags, paperclips or any other little trinket that needs a home. This dish measures appx 4.5".

Your dish will be lovingly wrapped in tissue secured with aqua and white string. Ready to give as a gift or keep as a treat for yourself. These dishes make great shower favors or hostess gifts too. The dish for sale is the single one shown and comes from a pet & smoke free home.

name: Small Dish with Marry Me and Ring
description:
This sweet little round ceramic dish is handmade from a free form piece of low-fire clay. I form each one in my hand so no 2 are alike. The diamond ring and text impression is colored with a cherry red glaze and then a clear glaze is applied to the entire piece. It is food safe glaze, but this little dish is good for rings, soggy tea bags, paperclips or any other little trinket that needs a home. This dish measures appx 4.5".

Your dish will be lovingly wrapped in tissue secured with aqua and white string. Ready to give as a gift or keep as a treat for yourself. These dishes make great shower favors or hostess gifts too. The dish for sale is the single one shown (ring not included) and comes from a pet & smoke free home.

name: Bee tea bag dish
description:
Need a home for your soggy tea bag? This little 2.5"+ round dish is made just for tea bags. The bee is colored with a cornflower blue glaze with a food safe clear glaze over that. 

Listing is for the single dish and it will be shipped in a padded envelope via regular mail.

name: Shell tea bag dish
description:
Need a home for your soggy tea bag? This little 2.5"+ round dish is made just for tea bags. The conch shell is colored with a bright aqua glaze with a food safe clear glaze over that. 

Listing is for the single dish and it will be shipped in a padded envelope via regular mail.
